DOC.brief_title: H1N1 Vaccine Pregnancy : Registry Fall Winter 2009

For three perinatal database , 5 non-vaccinated active control match maternal age +/- 3 year , same-hospital delivery , delivery date +/- 7 day . 2 . The passive non-vaccinated control derive precede year ( i.e. , 2008 ) . For three perinatal database , 5 non-vaccinated passive control match maternal age +/- 3 year , same-hospital delivery , delivery date +/- 7 day . For woman deliver Ontario , Niday Perinatal Database use . ( http : //www.nidaydatabase.com/info/index.shtml ) . For woman deliver British Columbia , data link British Columbia Perinatal Database Registry ( http : //www.bcphp.ca/Database % 20Content.htm ) . Women deliver Nova Scotia link Nova Scotia Atlee Perinatal Database ( http : //rcp.nshealth.ca/rcp_3347.html ) .
